main event: An unidentified flying object was observed in the sky over Indianapolis, Indiana on June 20, 1965.
interesting points: The object was described as having concentrated and rotating lights, with a size and speed estimated to be larger than a full moon and around 125-150 mph, respectively.
The object was first observed coming out of the northeast and traveling southwest, before disappearing into the southwest.
The object made various maneuvers, including stopping for a few seconds, changing brightness, and changing shape.
The object made a sudden speed up and rushed away at one point.
The witness compared the brightness of the object to a very bright, clear glow.
sighted object: a bright, glowing object in the sky
